Definition at line 302 of file Properties.h.

void Properties::alias ( const String &  primary,
const String &  secondary,
bool  overwrite = false 
)

Setup an property alias.

Primary has higher priority, meaning when aliases are sync'ed primary value can override secondary value

Parameters:
primary - primary property name
secondary - secondary property name
overwrite - whether to overwrite existing alias

Definition at line 287 of file Properties.h.

template<typename T >
T Hypertable::Properties::get ( const String &  name,
const T &  default_value 
) const [inline]

Get the value of option of type T.

Returns supplied default value if not found. Try use the first form in usual cases and supply default values in the config descriptions, as it validates the name and is less error prone.

Parameters:
name - name of the property
default_value - default value to return if not found

Definition at line 314 of file Properties.h.

void Properties::sync_aliases (  ) 

Sync alias values.

So properties that are aliases to each other have the same value. Value priority: primary non-default > secondary non-default > primary default > secondary default
